net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

类 OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.OFSwitchHandshakeState

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.OFSwitchHandshakeState
  • 直接已知子类:
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.InitState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.MasterState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.QuarantineState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.SlaveState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitAppHandshakeState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitConfigReplyState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitDescriptionStatReplyState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitInitialRoleState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitPortDescStatsReplyState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitSwitchDriverSubHandshakeState, OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.WaitTableFeaturesReplyState
    封闭类:
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandler

    public abstract class OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.OFSwitchHandshakeState
extends java.lang.Object
    Default implementation for message handlers in any state. Individual states must override these if they want a behavior that differs from the default. In general, these handlers simply ignore the message and do nothing. There are some exceptions though, since some messages really are handled the same way in every state (e.g., ECHO_REQUST) or that are only valid in a single state (e.g., HELLO, GET_CONFIG_REPLY
